game.name: Whispers of the Luminaries
game.categories: 싱글 플레이어, Steam 도전 과제, 가족 공유
game.shortDescription: A rising star vanishes without a trace. When police investigators hit a dead end, you're dragged into a case that gets progressively darker as you uncover the truth. Follow leads, solve logic puzzles, and shape your relationships in this VN inspired by Danganronpa & Famicom Detective Club.
